text:
@TexasTribune @GovAbbott Not to mention the obvious misclassification of these #COVID19 deaths as Pneumonia in Texas, Florida, and Georgia. 

This was taken from @ASlavitt post on May 29th, 2020: https://t.co/GHoGXvUqOj
